Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Fix Dify Chat API event parser to handle ''message'' events

The Dify Chat API integration was returning real responses but the event parser
was not handling the ''message'' event type correctly. Updated the parser to:

1. Handle ''message'' events from Dify Chat API (in addition to ''agent_message'')
2. Properly extract conversation_id and message_id from event data
3. Continue to support other event formats for backwards compatibility

Testing Results:
- API endpoint successfully returns streaming Dify Chat API responses
- Real conversation IDs (UUIDs) are being generated and tracked
- Content quality is high with comprehensive AI-generated explanations
- Streaming works reliably without timeouts or content truncation
- Backend logs confirm proper workflow routing and API integration

Files Modified:
- backend/services/chatWorkflowService.js: Updated event parser

The Chat API integration is now fully functional and ready for production use.
The "AIé—®ç­”" (AI Q&A) feature in the community forum posts now returns real,
comprehensive responses from Dify instead of mock data.
